overview: Drop-dead gorgeous blondes Samantha Saint and Alexis Monroe lead this cast of horny office sluts who will do just about anything to keep their jobs! The perks just keep on 'coming' as they 'de-brief' in every sense of the word! From the office flirt to the powerful executives, everyone in this place is excited about the 'bottom line' and burying themselves in their work! So get ready to play 'hardball' and tighten up the company ass-ets - cuz these are some Office Politics you won't want to miss!
title: Office Politics
